author: Timothy B. Lee
title: America’s COVID-19 testing has stalled, and that’s a big problem
description: We'll need a lot more testing capacity to get the coronavirus under control.
content:
Enlarge/ After growing exponentially for most of March, US testing has stalled out at around 100,000 tests per day.
11 with 8 posters participating
One of America's biggest fumbles in the early weeks of the coronavirus crisis was inadequate testing. Thanks … [+6364 chars]
